contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 23, 2017 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Metropolis 1927
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland Valaisia Brass Band absent due to Participation at the British Open, qualified at EBBC 2016.
Commence: 09.00 am.
Best March: Brass Band 13 Etoiles Best Own Choice: Brass Band Bürgermusik Luzern
Sept. 26, 2015, 12:25 p.m. Nov. 19, 2018, 2:04 p.m.
1 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach Feste Romane (L'Ottobrata and La Befana) [O. Respighi, arr. H.Snell]
2 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay Capriccio Espagnol [Rimsky-Korsakov, arr. B. Moren]
3 Brass Band Berner Oberland Corsin Tuor Overture Belfagor [O. Respighi, arr.]
4 Wallberg Brass Band Philip Harper Four Dances from Checkmate
5 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Francois Roh Hunnenschlacht (The Battle of the Huns) [F. Liszt, arr. B, Moren]
6 Brass Band Fribourg Maurice Donnet-Monay Russian Easter Festival Overture [N. Rimski-Korsakov, arr. B. Moren]
7 Brass Band Luzern Land Hervé Grélat Tannhäuser [arr. Grélat]
8 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Vincent Baroni Concerto for Orchestra [Bartok]
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Christoph Luchsinger Uranus & Jupiter (from The Planets Suite) [G. Holst, arr. Roberts]
10 Liberty Brass Band Ostschweiz Andreas Koller Carnival Overture [Dvořák, arr. Brand]
